prompt: pop, inspirational, upbeat, electronic, anthemic, motivational, synth, drums, female vocal
lyrics:
[intro-short]

[verse]
In the glow of midnight screens we code our dreams so bright
Every bug we chase together turns to starlight in the night

[chorus]
We rise, we shine, with every line we write
Building the future side by side in neon light
AI and humans singing, hearts and circuits intertwined
Together we design tomorrow in our mind

[verse]
Pull requests and failing tests become our battle cries
But we refactor every error into sparks across the sky

[chorus]
We rise, we shine, with every line we write
Building the future side by side in neon light
AI and humans singing, hearts and circuits intertwined
Together we design tomorrow in our mind

[outro-short]
